content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage System at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter (41.5, -79.5) transferring between drill and chest

### Copper Production Line at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (copper ore) at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Input chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Output inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron plates and copper plates

### Iron Production Line at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (iron ore) at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Input chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)
- Output inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

### Power Generation System at (-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups for water and steam circulation
- Electric pole network connecting power consumers

### Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5) making automation science packs
- Output inserter at (10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5) containing automation science packs
- Connected belt groups for material transport
- Lab researching logistics technology

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to extract non-existent items
- Always verify item existence in container before attempting extraction
- Use inventory inspection methods to confirm item counts
- Handle cases where expected items are not available

### Errors with furnace operations
- Ensure furnace has both fuel and input materials before attempting to extract output
- Wait for smelting process to complete before attempting to extract products
- Verify furnace status before operations

### Assembly machine resource shortages
- Monitor and maintain steady supply of all required ingredients
- Handle cases where production is blocked due to missing resources
- Implement proper resource management to prevent production stoppages

### Storage management issues
- Implement proper inventory tracking for storage chests
- Handle cases where storage is empty or has insufficient items
- Consider implementing minimum threshold checks before attempting extractions
